item.title: Common API Vulnerabilities
item.description: Understanding common vulnerabilities will help you identify weaknesses when you’re testing APIs. Information Disclosure Information may be disclosed in API responses or public sources such as code repositories, search results, news, social media, the target’s website, and public API directories. Sensitive data can include any information that attackers can leverage to their advantage. For example, a site that is using the WordPress API may unknowingly be sharing user information with anyone who navigates to the API path /wp-json/wp/v2/users
